deployable_transformations.author: Relevance AI
deployable_transformations.name: Generate text using GPT2
deployable_transformations.description: GPT-2 is a language model developed by OpenAI, which is the predecessor of GPT3 and GPT4. Run and deploy a custom transformation of GPT2 via the Huggingface transformers library.

deployable_transformations.author: Relevance AI
deployable_transformations.name: Generate images using Stable Diffusion
deployable_transformations.description: Generate images from text using Stable Diffusion v1.5 by Runway

deployable_transformations.author: Relevance AI
deployable_transformations.name: Generate Audio from text with Bark
deployable_transformations.description: Bark is a transformer-based text-to-audio model created by Suno, it can generate highly realistic, multilingual speech as well as music, background noise and simple sound effects. For example nonverbal communications like laughing, sighing and crying with [laughter], [laughs].
